UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial properties of brevinin-2-related peptide and its analogs: Efficacy against multidrug-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Ahmed E, Condamine E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25726(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=25µM)
